param.name: published
param.label: Published
param.description: Select publish status of the album. If unpublished the album will not be visible to the public.

param.name: title
param.label: Title
param.description: Optionally input a title. If no title is provided the date will be displayed as the title.

param.name: asset
param.label: Asset
param.description: Input the asset path for this album. Asset helps determine the location of this album. Leave blank to automatically set to profile.user_id.

param.name: user_id
param.label: Owner
param.description: Input owner as single integer user_id.
